Deposit.Description: Handles Ether deposits and updates the user's balance in the Holders mapping if the deposit is greater than the minimum amount.

WitdrawTokenToHolder.Description: Allows the owner to withdraw tokens to a specific address if that address has a balance.

WithdrawToHolder.Description: Handles Ether withdrawals and reduces the userâ€™s balance in the Holders mapping.

changeOwner.Description: Changes the pending new owner address but does not transfer ownership until confirmed.

confirmOwner.Description: Transfers ownership to the new owner if the confirmation is made by the new owner.

Decision Points.require(msg.sender == owner): Ensures that only the contract owner can perform certain actions.
Decision Points.require(msg.value > MinDeposit): Checks that the deposited amount is greater than the minimum deposit requirement.
Decision Points.require(Holders[_addr] > 0): Ensures that the user has enough balance to proceed with withdrawal.

State Transition Points.Update to Holders: Occurs when deposits or withdrawals are processed.
